name: 0 - Intro
_source: speak;; Malaku Mountain: the training ground of pegasus and wyvern rider aspirants.{w} It has a beautiful view of all of the nearby villages,{w} and Emma and company look upon the ruins of her home from on high as they march.{w} On their way, they have encounter an infamous outlaw who petitions their aid.;;;hint
speak;Caroline; The hike's been a long one, but the hideout should be just nearby.
speak;Caroline; That was to shut your sister up.{w} I mean it this time.

speak;Emma; I just can't believe Sundar could be so{tgm}...{tgm}miserable.{w} Murder and thievery around every corner!{w} I'm starting to see why you always fussed for Emily and I to stay in the village.

speak;Caroline; It wasn't always like this, you know.{w} There was a time when the knights used to protect the people{tgm}...{tgm}{w} These days, though, Sundar's a shadow of its former self.{w} Its glory in ruins, its army tattered, law and order gone.{w} It's a miracle we haven't been subjugated by another power.
speak;Emma; Is there anything we can do?
speak;Caroline; It doesn't look like it's going to change anytime soon, Emma.{w} Chaos breeds chaos, and people only unit under the banners of two sorts:{w} heroes and dictators.
